name: Raksasa
description:
In a small village, in the northern part of Japan, a rumor spreads which says that deep in the nearby forest, there is a place that can grant wishes, including resurrecting the dead.
The rumors spread to the ears of a mother who had lost her child after the war. Full of hope, he rushed to find the place, until he finally found it deep in the forest, a place of prayer with ancient tombs all around it.

The place turned out to be inhabited by a giant who was told according to legend to like to prey on people, the woman did not realize when she prayed while closing her eyes, that the giant was about to eat her. it turns out that the rumor was spread by the giant to invite its prey to come, taking advantage of human fragility and greed.
